short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Silent Voice Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD A Silent Voice background. A Silent Voice wallpaper themes for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Enjoy a new A Silent Voice wallpaper every time you open a tab.
2. Choose or favorite a A Silent Voice background via the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New Note feature to jot down your tasks.
7. Quick links to your most frequented websites.
8. Simplified access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel for adding and accessing favorite sites quickly.
10. Instant access to Google apps.
11. Explore More Themes with ease.
12. Share content to social media effortlessly.
13. Download wallpapers directly from the new tab.
14. One-click access to gaming.
15. Activate seasonal animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your A Silent Voice new tab.
